title: Trust in online customer reviews 2014 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Responses for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL 34.0 among the 5 groups and in Yes always, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read and lowest SOME LABEL in Response No I don't trust reviews at all.
There is a gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Response Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read and No I don't trust reviews at all.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Responses for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 5 groups, and it was for 2014. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response Yes always for 2014.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Responses for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL 34.0 among the 5 groups and in Yes always, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read and lowest SOME LABEL in Response No I don't trust reviews at all.
There is a gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Response Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read and No I don't trust reviews at all.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Responses on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL 34.0 among the 5 groups and in Yes always, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read and lowest SOME LABEL in Response No I don't trust reviews at all.
Response Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read and No I don't trust reviews at all had the biggest gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018.
Among the groups, 2014 had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 34.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.

In Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL 34.0 among the 5 groups and in Yes always, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 27.0 was observed for 2014 in Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others.

On average, the Response Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic had the highest SOME LABEL for all 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. Whereas No I am often skeptical about online reviews had the lowest average SOME LABEL.

data.Response: Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic
